trans-unit.source: Defines a specialized text run that is used to mark the end of a segment.
trans-unit.target: 定義特定文字執行，用來標記區段結尾。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment> ends the scope affected by a preceding <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier> text run.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment>結束範圍會受到前面<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextModifier>文字往返。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment" /> buffer.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment" /> character buffer.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment" /> 字元緩衝區的參考。

trans-unit.source: Gets the character length of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment" /> character buffer.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment" /> 字元緩衝區的字元長度。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> object that represents the length of the character buffer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 物件，表示字元緩衝區的長度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of properties shared by every text character of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment" /> character buffer.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextEndOfSegment" /> 字元緩衝區中每個文字字元所共用的屬性集。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> value that represents the properties shared by every text character.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunProperties" /> 值，表示每個文字字元共用的屬性。
